attributes.action: Condemn the actions of an artist who starved a dog to death for an exhibit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Guillermo Vargas "Habacuc" a Costa Rican created an art exhibit by tying an emaciated street dog up and letting it die for an art exhibit. 

Wording on a wall close by was actually made from dry dog food.

People walked past this and did nothing.

Despite this Vargas  was chosen to represent his country in the "Bienal Centroamericana Honduras 2008"

Please sign this petition to ask the government and individual MPs to express our condemnation of this act to the Costa Rican government and to lobby for the artist to be excluded from the "Bienal Centroamericana Honduras 2008".

I am unable to include links, but you will find pictures and an international petition on the internet.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
